title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data in a table within a grid cell
OB: When attempting to export data in a table that is located within a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: The export operation should complete successfully without any exception being thrown.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a grid.
2. Create a table within one of the grid cells.
3. Attempt to export the data in the table.
4. Note the exception that is thrown during the export process.
